title: LF Diamond + Players for OOL team
body:
Taking applications for mid, top and support. 
Add "Fresh Bowlcut" or "ImDooly" ingame for more info

replies.body:
Good Evening,

We want to know how you went in looking for players.
Please contact us at eLysiumeSportsOCE@gmail.com

www.elysiumesports.net
do you Mean OPL not OOL?
To get to OPL you have to go through OOL usually.
Once you win OOL you need to get into OCS then OPL, it's a journey xP
OR get recruited into a team thats already in the OPL
